metadata.title: CVE-2019-20429 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Lustre file system before 2.12.3, the ptlrpc module has anout-of-bounds read and panic (via a modified lm_bufcount field) due to thelack of validation for specific fields of packets sent by a client. This iscaused by interaction between sptlrpc_svc_unwrap_request andlustre_msg_hdr_size_v2.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
